title: Any other shop covered under the definition of convenience shopping, to whom license under the shops and establishment has been issued under the MMC Act
clause_text: Any other shop covered under the definition of convenience shopping, to whom license under the shops and establishment has been issued under the MMC Act. With the special permission, the Commissioner may from time to time add to, alter or amend the above list. "Corridor‚Äù means a common passage or circulation space including a common entrance hall.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Any other shop covered under the definition of convenience shopping, to whom license under the shops and establishment has been issued under the MMC Act. With the special permission, the Commissioner
